Title: Renames the NYS office for the prevention of domestic violence to the NYS office to end domestic and gender-based violence
Summary: Renames the NYS office for the prevention of domestic violence to the NYS office to end domestic and gender-based violence; makes necessary technical changes.
LawCode: Amd Art 21 Art Head, §§575, 214-b, 221-a, 837 & 840, Exec L; amd §530.11, CP L; amd §§153-c, 249-b & 812, Fam Ct Act; amd §§403 & 408-b, Gen Bus L; amd §2612, Ins L; amd §§10-a & 10-b, Lab L; amd §§2137, 2803-p & 2805-z, Pub Health L; amd §§17, 111-v, 349-a, 427-a, 483-cc & 483-ee, Soc Serv L; amd §97-yyy, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the criminal procedure law, the domestic relations law, the family court act, the general business law, the insurance law, the labor law, the public health law, the social services law, and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state office to end domestic and gender-based violence
